east_sussex_county_council.label: East Sussex County Council - Children's Services
east_sussex_county_council.summary: The local authority responsible for children's social care, safeguarding, early help, and family support services across East Sussex. Delivers statutory and preventative services to support children, young people, and families.
east_sussex_county_council.notes: Upper-tier local authority in the South East of England with statutory responsibility for children’s social care and family support. Children’s Services includes safeguarding and child protection, early help, support for children in care and care leavers, fostering and adoption, residential care, kinship care, services for children and young people with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND), and targeted support for families facing financial or social hardship. Works in partnership with health, police, education, and the voluntary sector through the East Sussex Safeguarding Children Partnership (ESSCP).
